data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Teemu Pukki puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 6, Marco Stiepermann instrumental with a fine assist.
Goal! Teemu Pukki extends Norwich's lead to 0-2.
That's a fine assist from Jakob Lungi Sorensen.
In the minute 15, Jack Hunt puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 1-2.
Great play from Jamie Paterson to set up the goal.
The first-half is over at Ashton Gate.
Goal! Norwich extend their lead to 1-3 through Emiliano Buendia.
In the minute 45, Ben Gibson with an assist there.
The second half has started at Ashton Gate.
In the minute 57, The home team replace Taylor Moore with Tyreeq Bakinson.
Jakob Lungi Sorensen (Norwich) gets a yellow card.
Ben Gibson (Norwich) has received a yellow card from Jarred Gillett.
In the minute 72, Norwich make their first substitution with Kenny McLean replacing Marco Stiepermann.
At Ashton Gate, Tim Krul has been yellow-carded for the away team.
An attacking Bristol City player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 75, Bristol City are awarded a penalty at Ashton Gate. Nahki Wells takes the kick ... But misses!
Antoine Semenyo is on a sub for Chris Brunt for Bristol City.
Norwich's Lukas Rupp has been booked in Bristol.
In the minute 78, Dean Holden is making the team's third substitution at Ashton Gate with Famara Diedhiou replacing Nahki Wells.
Daniel Farke (Norwich) is making a second substitution, with Jordan Hugill replacing Teemu Pukki.
The match is over. Final score 1-3.
Bali Mumba is replacing Przemyslaw Placheta for the away team.
